comments:
Fresh install of phpide-0.2.4_debugger-0.1.4-all-in-one-linux-gtk.tar.gz on fully updated FC5.

When creating a new file or opening an existing file with the default "PHP Editor" (in the PHP perspective), the PHP editor is blank and non-editable, and the .metadata/.log logs this exception :

Note : this error only occurs with Fedora's java-1.4.2-gcj-compat ; Sun's JRE yields no exceptions.
The bug is caused because of Eclipse doesn't fully support GCJ.
